Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The UBE3A gene encodes the E6 - AP ubiquitin - protein ligase and has recently been shown to be mutated in Angelman syndrome patients who lack 15q11 - q13 deletions or chromosome 15 paternal uniparental disomy .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Angelman syndrome |
| 15q11 - q13 deletions |
| Chromosome 15 paternal uniparental disomy |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Angelman syndrome |
| 15q11 - q13 deletions |
| Chromosome 15 paternal uniparental disomy |

Note: "UBE3A gene" and "encodes the E6 - AP ubiquitin - protein ligase" do not refer to diseases, but rather to the gene that is mutated in the context of Angelman syndrome.
